Yeah, I know.
It was a quick dialogue I thought of for a character I made.

Except he's not a pirate and not on a ship.

He has an eyepatch and one of his friends would ask why he wears one. He then answers by saying that he lost his eye by accidentally stabbing it when an earthquake happened.
